Build-Depends: bison, debhelper (>= 10), dh-python, dpkg-dev (>= 1.16.1), flex, freeglut3-dev, libosmesa6-dev, ghostscript, imagemagick, libfftw3-dev, libgc-dev, libgsl-dev, libncurses5-dev, libreadline-dev, libsigsegv-dev, libtimedate-perl, python3, tex-common, texinfo, texlive-latex-base, texlive-latex-extra, texlive-latex-recommended, texlive-fonts-recommended, texlive-pstricks, zlib1g-dev
Package-List: asymptote deb tex optional arch=any asymptote-doc deb doc optional arch=all
Uploaders: Hubert Chathi <uhoreg@debian.org>, Ruben Molina <rmolina@udea.edu.co>, Picca Frédéric-Emmanuel <picca@debian.org>, Norbert Preining <norbert@preining.info>
